context: C64 KERNAL API Detailed Reference (Lee Davison)

splits.reason: Title, credits, formatting instructions - not technical content

splits.name: kernal_api_detailed_system_serial
splits.description: KERNAL API detailed descriptions - system init ($FF81-$FF8A), vectors ($FF8D), serial bus (LISTEN/TALK/UNLISTEN/UNTALK, SECOND/TKSA, ACPTR/CIOUT), memory management, file I/O setup (SETLFS/SETNAM/OPEN/CLOSE)

splits.name: kernal_api_detailed_io_file
splits.description: KERNAL API detailed descriptions - channel I/O (CHKIN/CHKOUT/CLRCHN/CHRIN/CHROUT), file operations (LOAD/SAVE), clock (SETTIM/RDTIM), keyboard (STOP/GETIN), screen (SCREEN/PLOT/IOBASE)
